mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. The articles in this edition include "Miss Square Dancer's Wardrobe", "Let's Have a Commencement", "What the Press Has to Say...Square Dancing, A Year Old, Makes Redlands a Good Town", "On Getting Outfitted", This edition also includes the monthly articles entitled "On the Record", "The Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", and "From the Floor" (letters to the editor). This is the one year anniversary edition of Sets In Order.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
